name: Tamagotchi Original - Celebration Reflection (Amazon Exclusive)
short_description: The device will begin with the Obaketchi Angel (a ghost character) and depending on how you nurture your character will determine which of the 5 adult Tamagotchi Angel characters you will get!

Check the health meter to ensure you keep your Tamagotchi character happy. You can feed it, clean up after it, turn lights on/off to sleep, give it medicine, and even praise your Angel character. Plus, you can play the Shooting Star mini game!
A tapping feature is also included: tap the shell to bring your Angel Tamagotchi character back from a stroll. Or use the tap feature to scare off Batchi that tries to steal candy
Attach the device to clothes, bags, or anything you want with the included ball chain for a cute and fashionable accessory on the go!
Comes with 1 Tamagotchi device on a chain to take with you everywhere. Battery (CR2032) included. For Ages 8+
product_description: Celebrating the original digital pet you love, here's the Original Tamagotchi Celebration Reflection, designed in the Angel series with three dimensional wings! Wrapped in holographic packaging, the device is styled with Tenshitchi characters in a sparkly, mirror-like pattern that shines. Plus comes with a metallic pink mirror accessory! With Gen 3 programming you can raise angel-themed Tamagotchi characters, including Chestnut Angel! Depending on how you nurture your character will determine which of the 5 adult Tamagotchi Angel characters you will get. You feed it, clean up after it, and even praise it. Plus, you can play the Shooting Star mini game! Includes the CR2032 battery and attaches to your bag so it goes everywhere! Ages 8+
product_details: Number of Batteries 1 Nonstandard Battery batteries required. (included)
Material Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene, Metal, Polycarbonate, Silicone

name: Tamagotchi Nano x Peanuts with Silicone Case Set
short_description: Includes one Peanuts Tamagotchi Nano device and one Snoopy's doghouse silicone case
Take good care of Snoopy to see his outfit change or get a surprise visit from Woodstock or his fellow bird Harriet
Look for 12 special comic strip scenes that appear every hour
Feed Snoopy dog food or a donut snack, while Woodstock and Harriet are nourished with seeds and water
Play 3 mini games: WRITE THE GREAT AMERICAN NOVEL, BEAGLE SCOUTS, and SNOOPY’S SUPPERTIME
product_description: Tamagotchi and Peanuts join forces for the ultimate adventure featuring Snoopy! Users can feed, play with, and care for Snoopy in a pocket-sized digital pet experience. Depending on how well you care for Snoopy, you may see his outfit change or even get a surprise visit from Woodstock or his fellow bird Harriet! The device includes three mini-games: WRITE THE GREAT AMERICAN NOVEL, BEAGLE SCOUTS, and SNOOPY'S SUPPERTIME. Keep the Peanuts gang happy by feeding Snoopy dog food or a donut snack, while Woodstock and Harriet are nourished with seeds and water. Don't forget to look out for 12 special comic strip scenes that appear every hour, where you might even catch a glimpse of other beloved Peanuts characters like Lucy, Linus, or Pigpen! The Peanuts Tamagotchi Nano also comes with Snoopy’s red doghouse silicone case, offering a stylish and protective way to carry your device. If you don’t take good care of your virtual pets, expect a farewell letter accompanied by cute paw prints.
product_details: Number of Batteries 2 Nonstandard Battery batteries required. (included)

Feed it, turn lights on/off, play with it, give it medicine, flush after it’s used the bathroom, check it’s health and discipline your Tamagotchi if he bothers you when he’s happy, fed and all cleaned up
Includes Character game where you have to guess which way the Tamagotchi will move next!
Pink with sprinkles shell with pink 'Tamagotchi', brown buttons and yellow frame, and original programming and characters, and updated logo
Raise your Tamagotchi from egg to child to Adult and how you take care of it will decide which of the 7 Adults you’ll get. Comes with 1 Tamagotchi on a chain to take with you everywhere!
Battery (CR2032) included. For Ages 8+

name: TAMAGOTCHI Demon Slayer KISATSUTAITCHI Color | Collectible Electronic PET
short_description: DEMON SLAYER MEETS TAMAGOTCHI the Demon Slayer Tamagotchi Hashira Gathering series based on the nine most powerful swordmasters of the Demon Slayer Corps.
RAISE YOUR DEMON SLAYER If your Slayer is hungry, give it a rice ball. If they’re in a bad mood, give them green tea.
CARE FOR YOUR DEMON SLAYER There are three games to keep them happy. If you neglect training your Slayer, your Slayer will become injured. You need to make sure you treat the injury.
THREE UNIQUE SHELLS there are many fine details that fans would love with three different shell styles to choose!
Comes with 1 Tamagotchi with a red design on a chain to take with you everywhere!
product_description: Raise your demon slayer and master different breath styles with the Demon Slayer Tamagotchi. Based on your training methods, you can raise your character into one of many different Breath users. Feed your slayer either rice bowl or green tea and play three different games. If you neglect training, you Slayer will become injured. If you do not treat the injury, you will die. Japanese programming with a red design. Ages 6+

Three mini-games including one game that changes depending on your play pattern with 10 possible options

Special guests come and visit every hour
Age grade: 8 plus . Battery included (2 x LR44). No Wi-Fi needed
product_description: The Star Wars Grogu Tamagotchi Nano brings the beloved character to the palm of your hand like never before. It’s up to you to take care of Grogu, and how you do will change him into one of 12 different appearances, this includes three secret styles! Play two different mini-games, along with a third that alternates depending on how you interact with Grogu. The Tamagotchi Blue Version device comes with an included chain for on-the-go fun!

short_description: The funniest original virtual mascot of all time is back
Take care of your Tamagotchi You can feed it, bathe it, clean it, heal it when it is sick, play with it and of course, watch it grow
There are 6 different Pastel Bubble, Flames, Sakura, Retro flowers, Purple-Pink Clock and Logo Repeat models; The models are sold at random

product_description: The Original Tamagotchi virtual pet you loved in 1997 is back with a unicorn shell! With original programming, you feed it, clean up after it, take care of it and even discipline it if it’s bothering you when it doesn’t need you! How you take care of your Tamagotchi and how you do in the game, determines which of the 7 Adult Tamagotchi you’ll get! Plus, you can play the Character game where you have to guess which way your Tamagotchi will move next. Comes with one Tamagotchi on a chain so you can attach it to your bag and take it everywhere. Includes the CR2032 battery. Warning. Not suitable for children under 3 years. Contains small parts which may be swallowed

name: Tamagotchi Nano x Sanrio - My Melody
short_description: Take care of your Tamagotchi character together with help from My Melody and Kuromi! How you care for your Tamagotchi will determine which adult it will grow into
My Melody and Kuromi will bring your Tamagotchi character almond pound cake or pickled onions to eat!
Tidy up its room when it gets dirty. If you take good care of your Tamagotchi character, My Melody and Kuromi might give you a present!
Includes three mini-games: Piano Lesson, Shooting Star, and Balloon Making. Unlock a special performance when you get a perfect score!
Batteries (2x LR44) included. For Ages 8+
product_description: Tamagotchi Nano My Melody™️ & Kuromi™️ is a sweet and mischievous twist on the classic virtual pet experience, with a little help from your favorite Sanrio®️ duo! Join My Melody and Kuromi as they team up to help you raise your Tamagotchi character. Feed your Tamagotchi almond pound cake or pickled onions, tidy up its room, and see which character it grows into based on how you care for it. With their signature charm and unexpected antics, every moment is full of surprise! Play three adorable mini-games — Piano Lesson, Shooting Star, and Balloon Making — and unlock a special performance when you get a perfect score! Plus, keep your eyes out… if you take great care of your Tamagotchi character, My Melody and Kuromi just might reward you with a special gift. Available in two charming styles: My Melody™️ Version – soft pink with a pearlescent finish Kuromi™️ Version – clear lavender with a magical sparkle
